tit.e: Kyoto Shimbun (a newspaper based in Kyoto, Japan)
tit.cmt: カッコ部分を補いました。
tit.e: Kyoto Shimbun (a newspaper based in Kyoto, Japan)

sen.j: 京都新聞（きょうとしんぶん）は京都府と滋賀県を中心に発行されている地方紙。
sen.e: Kyoto Shimbun is a local newspaper published mainly in Kyoto and Shiga Prefectures.
Kyoto Shimbun is a local newspaper published mainly in Kyoto and Shiga Prefectures.
Kyoto Shimbun is a local newspaper published mainly in Kyoto and Shiga Prefectures.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 京都市に加え、大津市にも本社を置き、両府県の主読紙として定着している。
sen.e: With its headquarters in Otsu City as well as in Kyoto City, Kyoto Shimbun has become established as the most-read newspaper in both Kyoto and Shiga Prefectures.
With its headquarters in Otsu City as well as in Kyoto City, Kyoto Shimbun has become established as the most-read newspaper in both Kyoto and Shiga Prefectures.
With its headquarters in Otsu City as well as in Kyoto City, Kyoto Shimbun has become established as the most-read newspaper in both Kyoto and Shiga Prefectures.

sen.j: 準ブロック紙としての性格を持っている。
sen.e: It assumes a character of a quasi-block newspaper.
It assumes a character of a quasi-block newspaper.
It assumes a character of a quasi-block newspaper.

sen.j: 朝刊・夕刊を発行し、発行部数は約51万部（朝刊、2004年1月）。
sen.e: It publishes both morning and evening editions and has a circulation of about 510,000 (for the morning edition in January 2004).
It publishes both morning and evening editions, and runs about 510,000 copies (for the morning edition in January 2004).
sen.cmt: カンマを挿入し、”発行部数は約51万部”という部分を修正しました。
sen.e: It publishes both morning and evening editions, and runs about 510,000 copies (for the morning edition in January 2004).

sen.j: 論調は左派・革新的。
sen.e: The tone of its articles is left-wing and reformist.
The tone of its articles is left-wing and reformist.
The tone of its articles is left-wing and reformist.

sen.j: 京都には歴史的な文化財が多く存在し、また多数の大学が設置されている特性から、歴史・文化関係の記事や大学の記事が多い。
sen.e: It carries a large number of articles on historical or cultural issues and on universities, due to the characteristics of Kyoto which abounds in historical, cultural heritages and universities.
It carries a large number of articles on historical or cultural issues and on universities, due to the characteristics of Kyoto which abounds in historical, cultural heritages and universities.
It carries a large number of articles on historical or cultural issues and on universities, due to the characteristics of Kyoto which abounds in historical, cultural heritages and universities.

sen.j: 京都府、滋賀県以外にも大阪府（京阪本線の淀屋橋駅・天満橋駅・樟葉駅、ホワイティうめだ内の売店や三島郡 (大阪府)島本町の一部）や奈良県（近鉄京都線の高の原駅の売店）で販売されている。
sen.e: Its editions are sold not only in Kyoto and Shiga Prefectures but also in Osaka Prefecture (Yodoyabashi Station, Temmabashi Station and Kuzuha Station of the Keihan Main Line, kiosks in Whity Umeda and a part of Shimamoto-cho, Mishima-gun) and Nara Prefecture (kiosks in Takanohara Station of the Kintetsu Kyoto Line).
sen.cmt: 「天満橋」のローマ字表記は京阪電鉄の公式サイトによりました。
sen.e: Its editions are sold not only in Kyoto and Shiga Prefectures but also in Osaka Prefecture (Yodoyabashi Station, Temmabashi Station and Kuzuha Station of the Keihan Main Line, kiosks in Whity Umeda and a part of Shimamoto-cho, Mishima-gun) and Nara Prefecture (kiosks in Takanohara Station of the Kintetsu Kyoto Line).

Its editions are sold not only in Kyoto and Shiga Prefectures but also in Osaka Prefecture (Yodoyabashi Station, Temmabashi Station and Kuzuha Station of the Keihan Main Line, kiosks in Whity Umeda and a part of Shimamoto-cho, Mishima-gun) and Nara Prefecture (kiosks in Takanohara Station of the Kintetsu Kyoto Line).

sen.j: 新聞販売と広告営業などの事業は京都新聞社本社から分社化された「（株）京都新聞COM」が、新聞印刷事業は「（株）京都新聞印刷」行っている。
sen.e: Distribution of newspapers and sales of advertisements are conducted by "Kyoto Shimbun COM Co., Ltd. "spun off from Kyoto Shimbun Co., Ltd. and printing of newspapers is conducted by "The Kyoto Shimbun Printing Co., Ltd."

The distribution of newspapers and the sales of advertisements are conducted by 'Kyoto Shimbun COM Co., Ltd.' spun off from Kyoto Shimbun Co., Ltd., and printing of newspapers is conducted by 'The Kyoto Shimbun Printing Co., Ltd.'
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。The, カンマを挿入しました。
sen.e: The distribution of newspapers and the sales of advertisements are conducted by 'Kyoto Shimbun COM Co., Ltd.' spun off from Kyoto Shimbun Co., Ltd., and printing of newspapers is conducted by 'The Kyoto Shimbun Printing Co., Ltd.'

sen.j: 1面コラムのタイトルは「凡語（ぼんご）」。
sen.e: The front-page column is titled "Bongo"(plain words).
The front-page column is titled 'Bongo'(plain words).
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: The front-page column is titled 'Bongo'(plain words).

sen.j: なお、滋賀県ではブロック紙の中日新聞と販売エリアがバッティングしている。
sen.e: In Shiga Prefecture, the distribution area of Kyoto Shimbun overlaps that of Chunichi Shimbun, which is a block newspaper.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In Shiga Prefecture, the distribution area of Kyoto Shimbun overlaps that of Chunichi Shimbun, which is a block newspaper.
In Shiga Prefecture, the distribution area of Kyoto Shimbun overlaps that of Chunichi Shimbun, which is a block newspaper.

sen.j: 中日新聞は彦根市など県東部を中心にシェアが高く、大津市など県西部では京都新聞のシェアが高い。
sen.e: While Chunichi Shimbun has a large share in the east of the prefecture including Hikone City, Kyoto Shimbun is widely distributed in the west of the prefecture including Otsu City.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: While Chunichi Shimbun has a large share in the east of the prefecture including Hikone City, Kyoto Shimbun is widely distributed in the west of the prefecture including Otsu City.
While Chunichi Shimbun has a large share in the east of the prefecture including Hikone City, Kyoto Shimbun is widely distributed in the west of the prefecture including Otsu City.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1879年 浜岡光哲が「商報会社」を設立。
sen.e: 1879: Kotetsu HAMAOKA established a corporation named "Shoho-kaisha."
1879: Kotetsu HAMAOKA established a corporation named 'Shoho-kaisha.'
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1879: Kotetsu HAMAOKA established a corporation named 'Shoho-kaisha.'

sen.j: 6月に「京都商事迅報」という経済専門誌を創刊。
sen.e: An economic newspaper named "Kyoto Syoji Jinpo"was created in June.
An economic newspaper named 'Kyoto Syoji Jinpo' was launched in June.
sen.cmt: created→launched,クォーツ、スペースを修正しました。
sen.e: An economic newspaper named 'Kyoto Syoji Jinpo' was launched in June.

sen.j: これが源流となる。
sen.e: It is the origin of Kyoto Shimbun.
It is the origin of Kyoto Shimbun.
It is the origin of Kyoto Shimbun.

sen.j: 2ヵ月後に「商事迅報」と改題
sen.e: It was renamed "Syoji Jinpo" after two months of creation.
It was renamed 'Syoji Jinpo' after two months of the launching.
sen.cmt: creation→the launching,クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: It was renamed 'Syoji Jinpo' after two months of the launching.

sen.j: 1881年 「京都新報」創刊
sen.e: 1881: "Kyoto Shinpo" was created.
1881: 'Kyoto Shinpo' was launched.
sen.cmt: created→launched, クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1881: 'Kyoto Shinpo' was launched.

sen.j: 1882年 京都新報を「京都滋賀新報」と改題、関西で初めて紙面に見出しを付ける
sen.e: 1882: Kyoto Shinpo was renamed "Kyoto Shiga Shinpo" and started to carry headquarters on its paper for the first time in Kansai.
1882: Kyoto Shinpo was renamed 'Kyoto Shiga Shinpo' and started to put headlines in its paper for the first time in Kansai.
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。carry headquarters on→put headlines in
sen.e: 1882: Kyoto Shinpo was renamed 'Kyoto Shiga Shinpo' and started to put headlines in its paper for the first time in Kansai.

sen.j: 1884年 京都滋賀新報を「中外電報」と改題
sen.e: 1884: Kyoto Shiga Shinpo was renamed "Chugai Denpo."
1884: Kyoto Shiga Shinpo was renamed 'Chugai Denpo.'
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1884: Kyoto Shiga Shinpo was renamed 'Chugai Denpo.'

sen.j: 1885年 中外電報の姉妹紙として「日出新聞」を発行
sen.e: 1885: "Hinode shimbun" (Sunrise Newspaper) was created as a sister newspaper of Chugai Denpo.
1885: 'Hinode shimbun' (Sunrise Newspaper) was issued as a sister newspaper of Chugai Denpo.
sen.cmt: created→issued,クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1885: 'Hinode shimbun' (Sunrise Newspaper) was issued as a sister newspaper of Chugai Denpo.

sen.j: 1892年 中外電報を廃刊、日出新聞のみとする。
sen.e: 1892: Chugai Denpo ceased publication and only Hinode shimbun remained.
1892: Chugai Denpo ceased publication and only Hinode shimbun remained.
1892: Chugai Denpo ceased publication and only Hinode shimbun remained.

sen.j: 1897年 日出新聞を「京都日出新聞」と改題
sen.e: 1897: Hinode shimbun was renamed "Kyoto Hinode shimbun."
1897: Hinode shimbun was renamed 'Kyoto Hinode shimbun.'
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1897: Hinode shimbun was renamed 'Kyoto Hinode shimbun.'

sen.j: 1912年 「京都夕刊新聞」創刊
sen.e: 1912: "Kyoto Yukan shimbun" was created.
1912: 'Kyoto Yukan shimbun' was launched.
sen.cmt: created→launched, クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1912: 'Kyoto Yukan shimbun' was launched.

sen.j: 1916年 京都夕刊新聞を「関西日日新聞」と改題
sen.e: 1916: Kyoto Yukan shimbun was renamed "Kansai Nichinichi shimbun" (Kansai Everyday Newspaper).
1916: Kyoto Yukan shimbun was renamed 'Kansai Nichinichi shimbun' (Kansai Everyday Newspaper).
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1916: Kyoto Yukan shimbun was renamed 'Kansai Nichinichi shimbun' (Kansai Everyday Newspaper).

sen.j: 1920年 関西日日新聞を「京都日日新聞」と改題
sen.e: 1920: Kansai Nichinichi shimbun was renamed "Kyoto Nichinichi shimbun" (Kyoto Everyday Newspaper).
1920: Kansai Nichinichi shimbun was renamed 'Kyoto Nichinichi shimbun' (Kyoto Everyday Newspaper).
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1920: Kansai Nichinichi shimbun was renamed 'Kyoto Nichinichi shimbun' (Kyoto Everyday Newspaper).

sen.j: 1931年 神戸新聞社・時事新報大阪時事新報・京都日日の3社が合併、三都合同新聞社発足
sen.e: 1931: Kobe Shimbun Co., Ltd., Jiji Shinpo, the Osaka Jiji Shinpo News and Kyoto Nichinichi Shimbun Co., Ltd merged into Santo Godo Shimbun Co., Ltd.
1931: Kobe Shimbun Co., Ltd., Jiji Shinpo, the Osaka Jiji Shinpo News and Kyoto Nichinichi Shimbun Co., Ltd. merged into Santo Godo Shimbun Co., Ltd.
1931: Kobe Shimbun Co., Ltd., Jiji Shinpo, the Osaka Jiji Shinpo News and Kyoto Nichinichi Shimbun Co., Ltd. merged into Santo Godo Shimbun Co., Ltd.

sen.j: 1933年 京都日日新聞社が三都合同新聞社から独立
sen.e: 1933: Kyoto Nichinichi Shimbun Co., Ltd separated from Santo Godo Shimbun Co., Ltd.
1933: Kyoto Nichinichi Shimbun Co., Ltd. separated from Santo Godo Shimbun Co., Ltd.
1933: Kyoto Nichinichi Shimbun Co., Ltd. separated from Santo Godo Shimbun Co., Ltd.

sen.j: 1942年 戦時報道統制により、京都日日新聞と京都日出新聞が合併「京都新聞」を創刊
sen.e: 1942: Due to the wartime press restraints, Kyoto Nichinichi shimbun and Kyoto Hinode shimbun were merged together, and created "Kyoto Shimbun."
1942: Due to the wartime press controls, Kyoto Nichinichi shimbun and Kyoto Hinode shimbun were merged together, and launched 'Kyoto Shimbun.'
1942: Due to the wartime press controls, Kyoto Nichinichi shimbun and Kyoto Hinode shimbun were merged together, and launched 'Kyoto Shimbun.'

sen.j: 1946年 5月に夕刊京都創刊（1982年廃刊）
sen.e: 1946: Yukan Kyoto (Evening Daily Kyoto) was created in May (and ceased publication in 1982).
1946: Yukan Kyoto (Evening Daily Kyoto) was launched in May (and ceased publication in 1982).
1946: Yukan Kyoto (Evening Daily Kyoto) was launched in May (and ceased publication in 1982).

sen.j: 1949年 新年号紙面に戦後、関西では初のカラー印刷。
sen.e: 1949: The new-year edition was printed in color, for the first time in the postwar period in Kansai.
1949: The New Year's edition was printed in color, for the first time in the postwar period in Kansai.
sen.cmt: new-year→New Year's と修正しました。
sen.e: 1949: The New Year's edition was printed in color, for the first time in the postwar period in Kansai.

sen.j: 11月、戦後創刊の夕刊「京都日日新聞」を合併し「夕刊・京都新聞」として発行、朝夕刊制復活の口火を切る
sen.e: The Kyoto Shimbun acquired "Kyoto Nichinichi shimbun," an evening daily created after the Second World War, and renamed it "Evening Edition, Kyoto Shimbun," as one of its first measures for restarting publication of both morning and evening editions.

The Kyoto Shimbun acquired 'Kyoto Nichinichi shimbun,' an evening paper launched after the Second World War, and renamed it 'Evening Edition, Kyoto Shimbun,' as one of its first measures for reviving the morning and evening editions system.
sen.cmt: evening daily→evening paper,created→launched,後半部分を文脈に応じて修正し、クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: The Kyoto Shimbun acquired 'Kyoto Nichinichi shimbun,' an evening paper launched after the Second World War, and renamed it 'Evening Edition, Kyoto Shimbun,' as one of its first measures for reviving the morning and evening editions system.

sen.j: 1951年 京都放送を開局（ラジオ）
sen.e: 1951: Opened the Kyoto Broadcasting System, a radio station.
1951: Launched the Kyoto Broadcasting System, a radio station.
1951: Launched the Kyoto Broadcasting System, a radio station.

sen.j: 1956年 滋賀日日新聞の経営に参加（1979年に同紙休刊後、滋賀本社に継承）
sen.e: 1956: Participated in the operation of Shiga Nichinichi shimbun (and after its closing down, made it into the Shiga Headquarters).
1956: Joined the operation of Shiga Nichinichi shimbun (and after its closing down in 1979, made it into the Shiga Headquarters).
sen.cmt: Participated in→Joined と修正し、”1979年に”を補いました。
sen.e: 1956: Joined the operation of Shiga Nichinichi shimbun (and after its closing down in 1979, made it into the Shiga Headquarters).

sen.j: 1958年 関西テレビ放送を開局
sen.e: 1958: Opened Kansai Telecasting Corporation.
1958: Launched Kansai Telecasting Corporation.
1958: Launched Kansai Telecasting Corporation.

sen.j: 1982年 多色印刷システム完成
sen.e: 1982: Completed a multi-color printing system.
1982: Achieved the multi-color printing system.
1982: Achieved the multi-color printing system.

sen.j: 1983年 新刷版システムに紙面移行完了、鉛版93年の歴史に幕を下ろす
sen.e: 1983: Completed transition to the new printing plate processing system and ended a ninety-three-year-long history of lead plates.
1983: Completed the transition to the new printing plate processing system, and ended the 93 years history of lead plates.
sen.cmt: カンマを挿入しました。a ninety-three-year-long→the 93 years と修正しました。
sen.e: 1983: Completed the transition to the new printing plate processing system, and ended the 93 years history of lead plates.

sen.j: 1994年 神戸新聞社と「緊急事態発生時における新聞発行援助協定」を締結。
sen.e: 1994: Entered into the "Agreement for Assistance to Publishing Newspapers in an Emergency" with Kobe Shimbun Co., Ltd.
1994: Entered into the 'Agreement for Assistance to Publishing Newspapers in an Emergency' with Kobe Shimbun Co., Ltd.
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1994: Entered into the 'Agreement for Assistance to Publishing Newspapers in an Emergency' with Kobe Shimbun Co., Ltd.

sen.j: 1995年1月17日の阪神・淡路大震災で神戸新聞の本社屋が全壊した際、この協定をもとに京都新聞社で神戸新聞の紙面を制作・発行した
sen.e: When the main building of Kobe Shimbun Co., Ltd was completely destroyed by the Great Hanshin earthquake on January 17, 1995, The Kyoto Shimbun Co., Ltd produced and published the Kobe Shimbun News in accordance with the above-mentioned Agreement.

When the main building of Kobe Shimbun Co., Ltd. was completely destroyed by the Great Hanshin Awaji Earthquake on January 17, 1995, The Kyoto Shimbun Co., Ltd. produced and published the Kobe Shimbun News in accordance with the above-mentioned agreement.
sen.cmt: Ltd→Ltd.Great Hanshin earthquake→Great Hanshin Awaji Earthquake,Agreement→agrrement と修正しました。
sen.e: When the main building of Kobe Shimbun Co., Ltd. was completely destroyed by the Great Hanshin Awaji Earthquake on January 17, 1995, The Kyoto Shimbun Co., Ltd. produced and published the Kobe Shimbun News in accordance with the above-mentioned agreement.

sen.j: 1995年 神戸新聞との共同企画「生きる」で日本新聞協会賞を受賞。
sen.e: 1995: Was awarded Nihon shimbun Kyokai Prize (The Japan Newspaper Publishers and Editors Association Prize) for the joint project "Ikiru" (To Live) with the Kobe Shimbun News.
1995: Awarded the Nihon Shinbun Kyokai Prize (The Japan Newspaper Publishers and Editors Association Prize) for the joint project 'Ikiru' (To Live) with the Kobe Shimbun News.
sen.cmt: the を挿入し、Was を削除,shimbun→Shinbun,クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: 1995: Awarded the Nihon Shinbun Kyokai Prize (The Japan Newspaper Publishers and Editors Association Prize) for the joint project 'Ikiru' (To Live) with the Kobe Shimbun News.

sen.j: インターネットに情報発信開始
sen.e: Started to put out the information on the Internet.
Started to put up the information on the internet.
sen.cmt: put out→put up,Internet→internet と修正しました。
sen.e: Started to put up the information on the internet.

sen.j: 2006年 経営基盤の強化を目的に、グループ経営に移行。
sen.e: 2006: Moved to group management for the purpose of strengthening its operating foundations.
2006: Shifted to the group management for the purpose of strengthening its operating foundations.
2006: Shifted to the group management for the purpose of strengthening its operating foundations.

sen.j: 株式会社京都新聞社（グループ統括・編集・製作）、株式会社京都新聞COM（広告営業・新聞販売）、株式会社京都新聞印刷（新聞印刷）の3社に分割。
sen.e: The company was broken into The Kyoto Shimbun Co.,Ltd. (group control, editing and production), Kyoto Shimbun COM Corporation Limited (sales of advertisements and distribution of newspapers) and The Kyoto Shimbun Printing Corporation Limited (printing of newspapers).

The company was split into these three, The Kyoto Shimbun Co.,Ltd. (group control, editing and production), Kyoto Shimbun COM Corporation Limited (sales of advertisements and distribution of newspapers) and The Kyoto Shimbun Printing Corporation Limited (printing of newspapers).
sen.cmt: broken→split,these three を補いました。
sen.e: The company was split into these three, The Kyoto Shimbun Co.,Ltd. (group control, editing and production), Kyoto Shimbun COM Corporation Limited (sales of advertisements and distribution of newspapers) and The Kyoto Shimbun Printing Corporation Limited (printing of newspapers).

sen.j: 2007年 神戸新聞社の機器故障により、9月22日夕刊・9月23日朝刊の神戸新聞について、紙面制作を京都新聞社で行う。
sen.e: 2007: The Kyoto Shimbun Co., Ltd produced the evening edition of September 22 and the morning edition of September 23 of the Kobe Shimbun News due to the machine failure on the part of Kobe Shimbun Co.,Ltd.

2007: The Kyoto Shimbun Co., Ltd. produced the evening edition of September 22 and the morning edition of September 23 of the Kobe Shimbun News, due to the machine failure on the part of Kobe Shimbun Co.,Ltd.
sen.cmt: Ltd→Ltd.,カンマを挿入しました。
sen.e: 2007: The Kyoto Shimbun Co., Ltd. produced the evening edition of September 22 and the morning edition of September 23 of the Kobe Shimbun News, due to the machine failure on the part of Kobe Shimbun Co.,Ltd.

sen.j: 京都新聞九十年史（京都新聞社史編さん委員会 編） 1969年6月1日発行、575ページ。
sen.e: The Book of 90-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Committee) published on June 1, 1969; 575 pages
The Book of 90-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Committee) published on June 1, 1969; 575 pages.
sen.cmt: ピリオドを挿入しました。
sen.e: The Book of 90-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Committee) published on June 1, 1969; 575 pages.

sen.j: 京都新聞社小史（京都新聞社小史作成委員会 編） 1974年3月発行、230ページ。
sen.e: The Small Book of the History of Kyoto Shimbun Company Limited (edited by The Small Book of the History of Kyoto Shimbun Creating Committee) published in March, 1974; 230 pages
The Small Book of the History of Kyoto Shimbun Company Limited (edited by The Small Book of the History of Kyoto Shimbun Creating Committee) published in March, 1974; 230 pages.
sen.cmt: ピリオドを挿入しました。
sen.e: The Small Book of the History of Kyoto Shimbun Company Limited (edited by The Small Book of the History of Kyoto Shimbun Creating Committee) published in March, 1974; 230 pages.

sen.j: 京都新聞百年史（京都新聞社史編さん小委員会 編） 1979年12月発行、661ページ。
sen.e: The Book of 100-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Subcommittee) published in December, 1979; 661 pages
The Book of 100-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Subcommittee) published in December, 1979; 661 pages.
sen.cmt: ピリオドを挿入しました。
sen.e: The Book of 100-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Subcommittee) published in December, 1979; 661 pages.

sen.j: 京都新聞一〇五年小史（京都新聞社社史編さん委員会 編） 1984年6月発行、203ページ。
sen.e: The Small Book of 105-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The Company History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Committee) published in June, 1984; 203 pages
The Small Book of 105-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The Company History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Committee) published in June, 1984; 203 pages.
sen.cmt: ピリオドを挿入しました。
sen.e: The Small Book of 105-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The Company History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Committee) published in June, 1984; 203 pages.

sen.j: 京都新聞110年史（京都新聞創刊110年記念事業実行委員会社史編さん部会 編） 1989年10月発行、488ページ。
sen.e: The Book of 110-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by Kyoto Shimbun's 110th Anniversary Celebration Executive Committee, Company History Editing Group Meeting) published in October, 1989; 488 pages

The Book of 110-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by Kyoto Shimbun's 110th Anniversary Celebration Executive Committee, Company History Editing Group Meeting) published in October, 1989; 488 pages.
sen.cmt: ピリオドを挿入しました。
sen.e: The Book of 110-year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by Kyoto Shimbun's 110th Anniversary Celebration Executive Committee, Company History Editing Group Meeting) published in October, 1989; 488 pages.

sen.j: 京都新聞115年小史（京都新聞115年小史編纂委員会 編） 1994年10月発行、261ページ。
sen.e: The Small Book of 115- year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The Small Book of 115-year History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Committee) published in October, 1994; 261 pages
The Small Book of 115- year History of Kyoto Shimbun (edited by The Small Book of 115-year History of Kyoto Shimbun Editing Committee) published in October, 1994; 261 pages.
